input_args.text: ' Abby Martin Exposes John Podesta Video\nAbby Martin explores John Podesta\x92s political rise, his vast network of corporate connections and his think tank "Center for American Progress." Learn why the Podestas and the Clintons are a match made in ruling class heaven.\nWith the Wikileaks release of thousands of emails belonging to John Podesta, very little is known in US society about Podesta himself. While he\x92s maintained a low profile, John Podesta is actually considered one of Washington\x92s biggest players, and one of the most powerful corporate lobbyists in the world. Posted November 06, 2016'
